text: 9.20 Lo 31.29, Sng 106.37, 115.4-7, 135.15-17, Ais 2.8, 2.18-20, Dan 5.23, 1 Ko 10.19-20, Lep 16.9-11 Pen tap tɨmel anɨb okok binɨb kuŋay kɨlop paklel kumɨlak. Kumel, binɨb kuŋay yɨbɨl yelak okok gak anɨb ak nɨgɨlak ak pen, taynen tap si tap tɨmel gɨpun agɨl nɨŋɨd ma kelɨgɨlak. Pen tap ñɨnen gɨlak ak abe ma kelɨgɨlak. Tap yokɨp wɨdɨn ma nɨŋɨd, tɨmud ma nɨŋɨd, kanɨb ma ajel, gol, silpa, blas, kab, mab dɨl gɨlak okok kɨlop suk agɨnɨgun agɨl ma kelɨgɨlak. Kɨcheki tap okok abe kɨlop nep agnɨg yelak. Ma kelɨgɨlak.
